title: Why are Billie Eilish songs so successful? - Quora

response.answer_text: Her songs are very successful because she has an excellent personality, spirit, maturity yet sense of humour and is so happy now. She works really hard with her brother Finneas O’Connell to create music that they enjoy and like, rather than what they think people will enjoy. This way they please themselves in their music and are motivated to continue. her songs are also so successful because when she works with her brother they don’t need to be polite and gentle with opinions. I remember in an interview she said that, if either of them don’t like something, they’ll just say it sucks and move on and laugh about it. Also he doesn’t want to change her music or make her create for a specific genre.  At the end, Finneas talks about not changing Billie’s music. In summary, Finneas and Billie just complement each others styles so well and can share experiences freely to make amazingly successful music

Billie eilish’s songs are so successful because she puts alought of effort into her music along with the fact that each of her songs have there own story to go along with them. She is so successful because she is very good at what she does and knows how to put thoughts into her music, which most artist struggle with now days. Despite how famous she has gotten she does not let that get to her and still manages to be herself and doesnt let the fame get to her head she is extremely funny and has an amazing personality. And that is just some of the made reasons why her songs are so successful and why she is so successful.
